title: If Nothing Changes In Season 9, I'm Leaving For Good
body:
_**If**_

Towers still don't protect me once we hit level 6,
Solo impact is still at minimal,
Games are still one sided,
Resolve+Dorans Shield are still Braindead,
Bruisers still out damage everyone,
I'm still not able to pick a runes/mastery that fits my play style,
The amount of CS still doesnt matter,
I still get 1v1d when I dodge all skill shots and land all of mine against a non fed opponent,

Then I won't be here anymore. This season alone is cancer as is, every time I load up the game I question why I even play. People have been complaining since day 1 of Season 8, and Riot still has yet to listen. This season is brain dead as hell, you know its brain dead when Faker himself (the best player of League) cant solo carry games anymore.

he's probably doesn't understand the concept of jayce as a poke caster that can change into a melee brusier and can't sidestep any abilities or has no mr.

it's E Q, his W is his aura and attack speed

also, unless a jayce builds full AD, it'll never be more than 40%

a question here though is why was he against zoe?  was it late-game?

though even with his EQ combo, it becomes roughly 238 + 168% bonus AD damage at level 6

it's a lot, but i'm not sure if that even pegs 40% for most champs he faces anymore and at max level it's 320 - 448  + 120% bonus AD - 168% bonus AD

his real strength is his full combo that he can pull off repeatedly in a fight, but his ratios are on the lower side if he goes his standard bruiser build

his bases are (220 + 120% bonus AD)  + (100 magic damage per second up to 4 seconds) + (20% max health + 100% bonus AD)  + up to (448 + 168% bonus AD) and any auto attacks he manages to execute

typically he gets one hammer attack off and can get his full 3 ranged autos off, so he can get the bonus 145 + 25% bonus AD magic damage

overall, it's up to 220(+388% bonus AD damage) + 545(+25% bonus AD ) magic damage +430% AD (I forget how crits work with it)

if he builds glass cannon, his damage is fairly high.  If he does not, its not that great

even at 500 AD (which would be 400 bonus AD) that comes to 1552 ability physical damage, 645 ability magic damage and 2150 auto attack damage = 4347 or roughly on par with the higher end mages and WAAAAAY less safe

of course, he can spam these as all of his damage come from his autos and kit, but he only has 500 range on his autos and 600 for his hammer Q...which i'm not sure that makes sense, lol
Jayce is actually a hero which can easily kill zoe if she misses all her skillshots. She has literally one weak escape and you have a gap closer.

Solo impact is fine right now, but it is a 5v5 game after all so at least 30% games are guaranteed losses regardles of how good you are. Snowballing was fixed with shutdown gold changes, I do agree doran item starts are braindead but resolve tree/shield in particular are fine. Bruisers don't outdamage everything, rune/masteries do allow you to pick whatever suits your playstyle, and so on

Runes and masteries certainly do NOT allow you to play whatever suits your playstyle. 

I use to go full health regen quints and full tank runes along with resolve masteries on Soraka allowing me to get in peoples face and survive rather then big heals and damage laning phase. That's right, I had my runes and masteries down to a science.

Because it suited my playstyle so well I hit diamond with an 80% winrate. (Meanwhile my other support main friends tried it and felt completely useless the whole game struggling, and failing to win one with my soraka setup. )

Now it's simply not an option to take tank runes on Soraka. You'll get blown up the same way no matter what runes you take. 
You have no choice but to take sorcery.

Well, one issue is that tank runes are kinda shit. Then there's the forced stats you are forced to get which they already said they were going to change. Also, I hate how keystones sometimes feel like they take over champion identity.

Besides all that, I do think keystones are diverse enough
I wouldn't bet you ten cents that any change would happen.

The only reason some people like us log in is because they have nothing else to play, or they think game will change (it will never) or there's always that 1 guy that wants to play normals with us for ''fun''. And I don't see fun there at all. Normals are filled with zed,yasuo,jhin,vayne and all popular meta picks.
Nothing will change.

League has formed itself into a game decided by luck of the draw. Whichever team has more garbage players who constantly get caught loses period. This game isn't about your skill as a player anymore, its about luck.

I'm a veteran player. 

I experienced the S2 Bruiser domination and the S8 Bruiser domination.

I always standed against bruisers, the whole class is toxic.

>Solo impact is still at minimal,

Sounds as if you're just stuck and are looking for excuses. Solo impact will always be pretty small whenever you play at your mmr, simply because it's a team 5x5 game.

>The amount of CS still doesnt matter,

How exactly should it matter? The more cs you have, the faster you get your items. Sounds pretty important to me. 

>you know its brain dead when Faker himself (the best player of League) cant solo carry games anymore.

It's quite possible for a challenger player to carry a bronze game solo, which means that the difference in skill between faker and his opponents is just smaller. Also, he should not carry games solo because it's a 5x5 game after all.



To summarise, you put more crying in your words than actual thoughts based on how the game is played. I wonder what elo you're playing at.
Cool
It won't get better they still refuse to address the main problem. Snowball.

"Solo impact doesn't matter - the amount of cs still doesn't matter." Pick one. Fuck.

"Resolve + dorans shield braindead - I still get 1v1d when i dodge all skillshots and land mine against a fed opponent" - gross over exaggeration here. Come on.

ALso, towers aren't meant to protect you. You are meant to protect them as the game goes on.

Resolve and d shield have little impact on how much health people restore. Its only there to serve a somewhat small safe space for lanes that are gonna lose trades or poked down. Towers won't save you because its not their job to cancel any dives that go well such as if you feed your lane and then can't play well enough to stop dying under tower. Games are one sided because if you can't play well enough or have a good mentality to come back into a game then the winning team deserves the win and the losing team deserves their loss. Solo impact is up to the player and how well you decide to use your lead to help other lanes. Amount of cs does matter because it lets you take a passive route and lets you be able to farm and get items at a slower rate than others and hopefully let your team carry you and help you throughout the game. And if you lose 1v1 to a "non-fed enemy" its because you either suck, enemy is 10x better than you, or you're just behind. If you still haven't found a rune to compliment your play style, then you should probably learn how to play a new a champion that does because there is a wide variety of champions that take different runes. So either take the time and effort to learn how to play the game as it was made and stop complaining because life isn't fair and people don't get what they want all the time, because the fact riot was able to even come out with a game that's free to play and allows everyone to play with people in the same community as you to help you figure out what you're doing wrong, shows how toxic and how much of a spoiled brat you are to not take the time to learn the game. You can leave if you want, no one cares that you don't like how hard lol is. {{item:3070}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Untrue. It does matter unless someone has 10 kills by 10 minutes. It matters until someone gets fed.

> I still get 1v1d when I dodge all skill shots and land all of mine against a non fed opponent,

Same thing with marksmen. Bruisers will mostly out damage you in a 1v1 but there are a lot of champs who out damage them in teamfights.
